text: Yousef Al-Harbi (; born 16 March 1997) is a Saudi Arabian footballer who plays as a midfielder for Saudi Pro League side Al-Ahli. ==Personal life== He is the son of former Al-Ahli player Saad Mansi Al-Harbi.
